languages.text: {n}Абеляр говорит размеренно — видно, что слова даются ему нелегко.{/n} "Благополучие протектората фон Валанциус для меня — не пустой звук. Ради того, чтобы увидеть его расцвет, я оставил службу в Имперском флоте. Это было самое большое решение моей жизни. Я принял его, потому что увидел в деяниях Лорд-капитана Теодоры признак подлинного величия. Вольные Торговцы не просто открывают новые пути и захватывают миры, но создают порядок из анархии. Этой созидательности мне не хватало во время военной службы".

{n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр говорит размеренно — видно, что слова даются ему нелегко.{/n} "Благополучие протектората фон Валанциус для меня — не пустой звук. Ради того, чтобы увидеть его расцвет, я оставил службу в Имперском флоте. Это было самое большое решение моей жизни. Я принял его, потому что увидел в деяниях Лорд-капитана Теодоры признак подлинного величия. Вольные Торговцы не просто открывают новые пути и захватывают миры, но создают порядок из анархии. Этой созидательности мне не хватало во время военной службы".

I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the specter of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德说得很慢。看得出来，他这些话说得并不容易。{/n}“为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣，这对我而言并不仅仅是个口号而已。我当初之所以要离开帝国海军，就是为了见证这个王朝繁荣发展，这是我一生中最重要的决定。我之所以会这样做，是因为我在西奥多拉领主舰长的身上看到了真正伟大的精神。行商浪人所要做的事情，并不仅仅是简单地开辟新的航线，占领新的世界，而是在一片混乱之中创造秩序。我在军队服役期间，完全没有这种富有创造性的冲动。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德说得很慢。看得出来，他这些话说得并不容易。{/n}“为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣，这对我而言并不仅仅是个口号而已。我当初之所以要离开帝国海军，就是为了见证这个王朝繁荣发展，这是我一生中最重要的决定。我之所以会这样做，是因为我在西奥多拉领主舰长的身上看到了真正伟大的精神。行商浪人所要做的事情，并不仅仅是简单地开辟新的航线，占领新的世界，而是在一片混乱之中创造秩序。我在军队服役期间，完全没有这种富有创造性的冲动。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard habla con lentitud, y es evidente que le cuesta hacerlo.{/n} «La prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius es mucho más que meras palabras para mí. Abandoné la Armada Imperial por la oportunidad de verlo florecer. Esa fue la decisión más determinante de toda mi vida, y la tomé porque vi indicios de auténtica grandeza en las acciones de la Lord Capitán Theodora. Los Comerciantes Independientes no se limitan a forjar nuevas rutas y capturar mundos: crean orden de la anarquía. Ese impulso creativo estuvo totalmente ausente durante mi servicio en el ejército».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard habla con lentitud, y es evidente que le cuesta hacerlo.{/n} «La prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius es mucho más que meras palabras para mí. Abandoné la Armada Imperial por la oportunidad de verlo florecer. Esa fue la decisión más determinante de toda mi vida, y la tomé porque vi indicios de auténtica grandeza en las acciones de la Lord Capitán Theodora. Los Comerciantes Independientes no se limitan a forjar nuevas rutas y capturar mundos: crean orden de la anarquía. Ese impulso creativo estuvo totalmente ausente durante mi servicio en el ejército».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは話しづらそうに、ゆっくりと言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の繁栄は、我にとって単なる空言ではありません。我はこの国の繁栄を見るために帝国海軍を辞したのです。これは人生で最も重大な決断でした。ですが、我はロード・キャプテン・シオドーラの行いに真の偉大さの証を見たのです。自由開拓者の為すべきは、単に新しい航路を開拓したり、惑星を制圧したりするだけではありません…彼らは、無秩序から秩序を生み出すのです。その創造的な衝動は、我の軍隊時代にはまったく欠けていたものでした」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは話しづらそうに、ゆっくりと言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の繁栄は、我にとって単なる空言ではありません。我はこの国の繁栄を見るために帝国海軍を辞したのです。これは人生で最も重大な決断でした。ですが、我はロード・キャプテン・シオドーラの行いに真の偉大さの証を見たのです。自由開拓者の為すべきは、単に新しい航路を開拓したり、惑星を制圧したりするだけではありません…彼らは、無秩序から秩序を生み出すのです。その創造的な衝動は、我の軍隊時代にはまったく欠けていたものでした」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard spricht langsam, die Worte fallen ihm nicht leicht.{/n} "Der Wohlstand des Protektorats von Valancius ist für mich nicht nur eine leere Phrase. Ich habe die Imperiale Kriegsflotte verlassen, um die Chance zu haben, das Protektorat aufblühen zu sehen. Es war die bedeutsamste Entscheidung meines Lebens. Ich habe es getan, weil ich in Lord Captain Theodoras Taten die Zeichen wahrer Größe erkannt habe. Freihändler beschreiten nicht nur neue Wege und erobern Welten. Sie erschaffen aus Anarchie Ordnung. Dieser kreative Impuls war während meiner gesamten Zeit beim Militär nie vorhanden gewesen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard spricht langsam, die Worte fallen ihm nicht leicht.{/n} "Der Wohlstand des Protektorats von Valancius ist für mich nicht nur eine leere Phrase. Ich habe die Imperiale Kriegsflotte verlassen, um die Chance zu haben, das Protektorat aufblühen zu sehen. Es war die bedeutsamste Entscheidung meines Lebens. Ich habe es getan, weil ich in Lord Captain Theodoras Taten die Zeichen wahrer Größe erkannt habe. Freihändler beschreiten nicht nur neue Wege und erobern Welten. Sie erschaffen aus Anarchie Ordnung. Dieser kreative Impuls war während meiner gesamten Zeit beim Militär nie vorhanden gewesen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard parle lentement, comme si les mots lui manquaient.{/n} « Voyez-vous, le développement du protectorat von Valancius me tient à cœur. J'ai quitté la Marine Impériale dans le seul but de le voir prospérer. Ce fut la décision la plus radicale de toute ma vie, et si je l'ai prise, c'est parce que j'ai tout de suite vu que la seigneure-capitaine Théodora était appelé à faire de grandes choses. Les libres-marchands ne se contentent pas d'ouvrir des routes commerciales et de conquérir des planètes, ils forgent un ordre nouveau à partir du chaos le plus complet. C'est cet élan créatif qui me manquait du temps où j'étais dans l'armée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard parle lentement, comme si les mots lui manquaient.{/n} « Voyez-vous, le développement du protectorat von Valancius me tient à cœur. J'ai quitté la Marine Impériale dans le seul but de le voir prospérer. Ce fut la décision la plus radicale de toute ma vie, et si je l'ai prise, c'est parce que j'ai tout de suite vu que la seigneure-capitaine Théodora était appelé à faire de grandes choses. Les libres-marchands ne se contentent pas d'ouvrir des routes commerciales et de conquérir des planètes, ils forgent un ordre nouveau à partir du chaos le plus complet. C'est cet élan créatif qui me manquait du temps où j'étais dans l'armée. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard yavaşça konuşuyor. Kelimelerini zorlukla seçiyor.{/n} "Von Valancius protektorasının refahını yürekten önemsiyorum. İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan da bunun için ayrıldım. Hayatımın en mühim kararı buydu. Bu kararı, Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın yaptıkları, sahih yüceliğin göstergesi olduğu için verdim. Hür Tacir dediğimiz yalnızca yeni rotalar çizip dünyalar fethetmemeli. Kargaşadan düzen de yaratabilmeli. Orduda görev yaptığım sırada bu yaratıcı güdüden tümüyle mahrumdum."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard speaks slowly, the words not coming easily to him.{/n} "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is not just an empty phrase to me. I left the Imperial Navy for the chance to see it flourish. It was the most momentous decision of my life. I did it because I saw in Lord Captain Theodora's deeds the sign of true greatness. Rogue Traders do not simply forge new routes and capture worlds — they create order out of anarchy. That creative impulse was entirely lacking during my time in the military."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard yavaşça konuşuyor. Kelimelerini zorlukla seçiyor.{/n} "Von Valancius protektorasının refahı, benim için laftan ibaret değil. İmparatorluk Donanması'ndan da bunun için ayrıldım. Hayatımın en mühim kararı buydu. Bu kararı, Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın yaptıkları sahih yüceliğin göstergesi olduğu için verdim. Hür Tacir dediğin yalnızca yeni rotalar çizip dünyalar fethetmemeli. Kargaşadan düzen de yaratabilmeli. Orduda görev yaptığım sırada bu yaratıcı güdüden tümüyle mahrumdum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
